RainbruRPG::Gui::PlayerNotePad

RainbruRPG::Gui::PlayerNotePad Class Reference

#include <playernotepad.h>

Collaboration diagram for RainbruRPG::Gui::PlayerNotePad:

[legend]
List of all members.

Detailed Description

The fltk dialog providing a player notepad.

The notepad is open only for a player. The player's name is in the notepad's window title bar.

To add a title, enter a title and the add button will be activated.

void RainbruRPG::Gui::PlayerNotePad::i_cbTextChange (  )  [inline, private]

The note's text multiline input widget's callback.

It activates the saveBtn button if existingNote is true (we are modifying an existing note).

Member Data Documentation

const char* RainbruRPG::Gui::PlayerNotePad::modifiedNoteTitle [private]

I use the unmodified title to know wich note i must save.

If the title is changed, i test with this one.

Definition at line 107 of file playernotepad.h.

bool RainbruRPG::Gui::PlayerNotePad::existingNote [private]

If true, we are in an existing note so if we modify, we can activate the save button.

If false, we have not selected a note so it is a new note : the add button is activated
